archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0023
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an existing customer, I want to be able to purchase a new SIM via MMR, so that I can get an additional mobile plan

properties.value: This is about a scenario in which a customer buys a sim in a supermarket (outside of comarch) and then enters the Digital Sales to continue (select plan etc). It is assumed that preprovisioning SIM will be sold in shops (blank SIM), there is no available services on it, when customer tries to make data session redirection to VF website shuld be done, in case of voice session redirection to IVR should be done.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
